pageTitle: Bear Course at Breckenridge Golf Club, Breckenridge
textBeforeTable: Jack Nicklaus designed mountain course offers a challenge to the better golfer. A great layout with many small greens, mostly gently sloping. Very busy municipal course. Feature hole is the downhill 12th (par 5) that is linked by several beaver ponds. Si tuated at 9,300 feet, in the Summit County which is a part of the continental divide the course is rated the 2nd most difficult in Colorado. Because of the altitude, golfcarts a necessary.
